data: “Hey, Freddy, Scott, you got to check this out,” Special Agent Michelle Clancy said as she trotted into the free weights room of the FBI’s Baltimore field office gym.
free weights room | FBI’s Baltimore field office gym
“HEY,  Freddy,  Scott,  you  got  to  check  this  out,”  Special  Agent Michelle  Clancy  said  as  she  trotted  into  the  free  weights  room  of  the FBI's Baltimore field office gym.
